price: 42. Dan janganlah kamu campuradukkan kebenaran dengan kebatilan*(23) dan (janganlah) kamu sembunyikan kebenaran, sedangkan kamu mengetahuinya!
arabic: وَلَا تَلۡبِسُواْ ٱلۡحَقَّ بِٱلۡبَٰطِلِ وَتَكۡتُمُواْ ٱلۡحَقَّ وَأَنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ
footnotes: *23). Batil artinya kesalahan, kejahatan, kemungkaran dan semisalnya.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā talbisū al-ḥaqa bil-bāṭili wataktumū al-ḥaqa wa-antum taʿlamūna
